ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Software for genomic prediction with the RR-BLUP mixed model (Endelman 2011, <doi:10.3835/plantgenome2011.08.0024>). One application is to estimate marker effects by ridge regression; alternatively, BLUPs can be calculated based on an additive relationship matrix or a Gaussian kernel.

Software for genomic prediction with the RR-BLUP mixed model (Endelman 2011, <doi:10.3835/plantgenome2011.08.0024>). One application is to estimate marker effects by ridge regression; alternatively, BLUPs can be calculated based on an additive relationship matrix or a Gaussian kernel.

name: r-rrblup
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.6.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rrblup
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rrBLUP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rrBLUP/rrBLUP_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cd2a257ecb8252f352fd09189b538db62e4de4a51091cf392c18966c3f0c80cd

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rrBLUP')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rrBLUP')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://potatobreeding.cals.wisc.edu/software
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Software for genomic prediction with the RR-BLUP mixed model (Endelman 2011, <doi:10.3835/plantgenome2011.08.0024>). One application is to estimate marker effects by ridge regression; alternatively, BLUPs can be calculated based on an additive relationship matrix or a Gaussian kernel.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jenzopr

# Package: rrBLUP
# Title: Ridge Regression and Other Kernels for Genomic Selection
# Version: 4.6
# Author: Jeffrey Endelman
# Maintainer: Jeffrey Endelman <endelman@wisc.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 2.14)
# Imports: stats, graphics, grDevices
# Suggests: parallel
# Description: Software for genomic prediction with the RR-BLUP mixed model (Endelman 2011, <doi:10.3835/plantgenome2011.08.0024>). One application is to estimate marker effects by ridge regression; alternatively, BLUPs can be calculated based on an additive relationship matrix or a Gaussian kernel.
# License: GPL-3
# URL: http://potatobreeding.cals.wisc.edu/software
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-01-06 23:48:29 UTC; endelman
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-01-28 22:33:52 UTC
